summary:
A re-texture of Stalhrim Heavy and Light Armors, both male and female.

REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC!
descriptionHtml:
=Description=

A retexture of Stalhrim Heavy and Light armors, both male and female.


=Plans for the Near Future=

-Stalhrim Weapons
-Stalhrim Ore and Deposits


=Install=

Extract \"Stalhrim Retexture\" and copy everything to your Skyrim \"Data\" folder. (C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)


=Credit=

None to give. If you\'d like to add to/edit/fix something it\'s vanilla armor so you don\'t need my permission :)

**Please let me know if something isn\'t uploaded correctly or if there\'an error in the path. Thanks and don\'t forget to Endorse if you like it!**



PS: I\'m aware \"Stalhrim\" is misspelled in the folder/file names. DO NOT FIX IT or your paths will be off.
author: Jackel58
